benchmark_details.name: InPlan3D
benchmark_details.overview: InPlan3D is a comprehensive benchmark for 3D task planning, consisting of 3,174 long-term planning tasks across 636 indoor scenes.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To evaluate the reasoning capability of Multimodal Large Language Models (MLLMs) in the context of 3D task planning.

data.source: Curated 3D indoor scenes and constructed planning tasks from the perspective of an indoor service robot.
data.annotation: Tasks are described with high-level instructions followed by detailed step-by-step actions.

methodology.calculation: Metrics are calculated based on the correctness of the generated plans against ground truth.
methodology.interpretation: Higher metrics indicate better reasoning and planning capabilities in 3D environments.
